properties.entry: SELECT M_NO , M_NAME , M_ID , M_NICKNAME , M_PWD , M_RRN , M_PHONE , M_EMAIL , M_ADDRESS , M_DATE , M_MODIFY , M_STATUS , M_REPORT , M_GRADE , M_PROFILE FROM MEMBER WHERE M_ID = ? AND M_PWD = ? AND M_STATUS = 'U'
INSERT INTO MEMBER ( M_NO , M_NAME , M_ID , M_NICKNAME , M_PWD , M_RRN , M_PHONE , M_EMAIL , M_ADDRESS , M_PROFILE ) VALUES ( SEQ_MEM.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM MEMBER WHERE M_STATUS = 'U'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT M_NO , M_NAME , M_ID , M_NICKNAME , M_PWD , M_RRN , M_PHONE , M_EMAIL , M_ADDRESS , M_DATE , M_MODIFY , M_STATUS , M_REPORT , M_GRADE , M_PROFILE FROM MEMBER WHERE M_STATUS != 'N' ORDER BY M_REPORT DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET M_STATUS = 'B' WHERE M_NO = ?
SELECT M_NO , M_NAME , M_ID , M_NICKNAME , M_PWD , M_RRN , M_PHONE , M_EMAIL , M_ADDRESS , M_DATE , M_MODIFY , M_STATUS , M_REPORT , M_GRADE , M_PROFILE FROM MEMBER WHERE M_ID = ? AND M_STATUS = 'U'
SELECT COUNT(*) "COUNT" FROM MEMBER WHERE M_ID = ?
